topics.body:
So anyone watch ALDNOAH.ZERO? The anime made by Urobutcher. 
Seriously that anime just finished its first season just recently and I have to say that it was one hell of a shocker. The main character dies thanks to some white haired idiot who thought that saving the life of a manipulative murderer bent on bringing total destruction to humanity was a good idea. 

Also he ended up indirectly getting the love of his life killed. So yeah double whammy, well at least the manipulative jackass is dead. And we've still got a missing princess, who may or may not be dead. 

Man I'd love to see if anyone can turn this into a good MLP fanfic. 
Though someone would have to figure out how to kill off 4 characters off around the middle of the story. And then pick up right after that. 

XD
